data.title: Broadway Performer Sharon Catherine Brown - MikeyPod
data.meta_description: Host Michael Harren Broadway performer Sharon Catherine Brown about her work on the new musical, Head Over Heels. Music featured from Alyson Greenfield.
data.text:
I met Sharon Catherine Brown during the intermission of Broadway’s Head Over Heels and was absolutely blown away by her kind and beautiful energy. I was, of course, thrilled to discover that she is also a fellow vegan. I’m so excited to share this conversation with you here where we talked about everything from her experience on the Broadway stage to her belief that we all must be activists for each other.

Sharon Catherine Brown has numerous Broadway credits including Dreamgirls, and Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat. Her film credits include A Chorus Line, What’s Love Got to Do With It, and Sister Act. She is currently appearing on Broadway in the new musical, Head Over Heels.

If you like this podcast, please consider joining my Patreon community for special perks and community vibes! This week’s bonus content will be an exclusive interview with luke kurtis of bd-studios.com only available to $5+ subscribers!

Follow Sharon Catherine Brown on Instagram and Twitter.

Follow Head Over Heels on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and YouTube.

Head Over Heels Original Cast Recording is on Spotify, Apple Music, and all the other places.

Music:

Bad Boys – Alyson Greenfield

Dreaming My Dreams – Alyson Greenfield

Special thanks to Nolan Doran for introducing me to Sharon and his work in making this interview possible.

Come see my solo multi-media performance The Animal Show in Boston on Oct 22! All the info is right here.
